name: Operation Calundra V
description:
Due to time limit of the Jam, I couldn't finish the game, so it is incomplete. This is only a Demo :'(

Enemies Animations and health features are missing (As some others).

I hope you enjoy what I tried to make :D

Prologue

A few weeks ago we have received some kind of distress signal, coming from Space Station Calundra V. An squad have been sent to help the crew, but 3 days have passed since we've lost communications with the Sparky-X Spacecraft, few minutes after landing.

Second squad will be sent to figure out what happened, and well... to retrieve important data. 

Missions

- Retrieve Data from Main Computer: You'll need to recharge battery cells, bringing them to generator and putting them back into it's Battery Holder. This is the only way to open doors and gain access to Main Computer.

- Go to the extraction point: Once you have all data copied, you must return to extraction point and finish mission.

Controls

Arrows -> Move Character

Mouse -> Aim Blaster

Mouse Left -> Shoot Blaster

E -> Interact with Objects and Doors

Credits

Programming and Design: Lucas Queiroz (firemanarg)

Music and Sound: Alexandre Mascarenhas
